titleStmt.title: A discourse whether it may be lawful to take use for money written by Sir Robert Filmer ; and published by Sir Roger Twisden, with his preface to it.
titleStmt.author: Filmer, Robert, Sir, d. 1653.

notesStmt.note: Written in 1630 and printed in 1656 under title : Quaestiones quodlibeticae, a discourse whether it may be lawful to take use for money.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
